name: Autumn Memories
description:
Autumn Memories is a visual novel sim game about a teenager infiltrating a rival bakery cafe's workforce. Will you choose to sabotage or to befriend the staff working there?

Your parents own a bakery cafe but ever since the new Bon Bon Bien cafe popped up two streets over, business has been in the decline. As a new strategy, your parents sent you to go work there, to find out their secrets and sabotage them.

Autumn Memories is focused on friendships. It was originally a comic anthology project, but our circle decided to turn it to a interactive story instead. Every route is written and drawn by a different individual.

This demo is a sneak preview of our current build for the game.
  • 4 routes with different staff members
  • 13.000~ words
  • Day Planning simulation
  • Play as a guy or a girl

This is version 0.7, and it is not complete, but we would love some feedback to see if we are on the right track and to know what we can improve on.
